Moris completely ruin the game. Just as there are many things as a killer that are not fun to play against (like object of obsession) Moris are just not fun to play against as survivor. There is literally NOTHING you can do to counter them, other than playing a perfect game and not getting downed once, as after one hook, thats it. The worst part is that you almost always depip from it. HOW DO I PREVENT THAT? HOW DO I NOT DERANK AGAINST SOMETHING THAT CAN INSTA KILL ME WITH NO WAY TO NOT HAVE IT HAPPEN? Just when I start getting close to lower ranks, moris come out and stop me from being able to progress. Even when I did 3 gens, healed several teammates, and looped the killer for a good bit, I still depiped because I was farmed off first hook.

TL;DR: Buy the game. It is good :D

Game in a NUTSHELL:
This is a  4 vs 1 multiplayer game where 4 Survivors are trying to escape from the Killer. In order to do this, survivors must work together to repair generators, distract the killer, help each other, etc.

What I LIKE:
(+) Killers and survivors are from iconic games, movies, tv shows etc. For example you can play 'Bill' from 'Left 4 Dead' as one of the survivors, 'Ghostface' from 'Scream' as one of the killers and 'Nancy Wheeler' from 'Stranger Things' as one of the other survivors. As of right now, the game has a total number of 20 killers and 22 survivors. And trust me, each of them are unique and fun to play.
(+) Every map is cool. Similar to killers and survivors, some maps are from games, tv shows, etc. and even if you get the same map you just played, the game has a mechanism which changes some of the stuff in the map. This way, you get a new experience from the same map!
(+) This is specific to playing as killers but O.M.G! It is so fun to play as the killer. I can't emphasize how much fun it is to see survivors trying to escape from you only to be sacrificed to the entity.
(+) Non toxic community. This game is about helping each other to escape. You will be surprised how many times people will help you to try escape together.

What I do NOT LIKE:
(-) Sometimes I get frame spikes which make it hard to play the game (This may be happening to me because I have an old pc)
(-) You need to grind for characters/killers if you didn't buy the DLCs.

Overall, I'm happy that I bought this game. You can wait for a deal and buy all the DLCs too :D
